Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
function Configure()
{
    $installationSettingsKeyPath = @('HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Teleopti\TeleoptiCCC\InstallationSettings')
    $teleoptiWfmRoot = (Get-ItemProperty $installationSettingsKeyPath).INSTALLDIR
    
    ConfigureWebConfig 'Administration'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'Analytics'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'AuthenticationBridge'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'PMService'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'SDK'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'Web'
    ConfigureWebConfig 'WindowsIdentityProvider'
}

function ConfigureWebConfig
{
    param(
        $ModuleName
    )

    # "C:\Program Files (x86)\Teleopti\TeleoptiCCC\Administration\web.config"
    [string] $webConfigFilePath = $teleoptiWfmRoot + 'TeleoptiCCC\' + $ModuleName + '\web.config'
    Write-Host 'Modifying: ' $webConfigFilePath
    $webConfig = New-Object XML
    # load web.Config file as an xml object
    $webConfig.Load($webConfigFilePath)

	#     <machineKey validationKey="C2A453601FD78AB4D638796B2320D1509FAC582BC424AF1DC76C73FBBB1B59C9FE069448A03F4310A923F4428CBBE22836291EA5623C858EE10A7ABDE8EAE989" decryptionKey="BFCB85C8793D18385E88665EEBDECB496FAE587E5D9F0FE9" decryption="AES" validation="SHA1" />
    $obj = $webConfig.configuration.'system.web'.machineKey
    if ($obj) 
	{
		$obj.validationKey = $MACHINE_KEY_VALIDATION
		$obj.decryptionKey = $MACHINE_KEY_DECRYPTION
	}
    $webConfig.Save($webConfigFilePath)
}

Configure
